modmenu.descriptionTranslation.chromium: This mod was created for personal use and includes some useful features that I use.
Displays in the top-left corner during gameplay.
Below, you can customize which parameters are displayed.
options.chromium.group.teViewDistance.de: Like the usual render distance, but separately for block entities.
options.chromium.showFps.description.1: Adds the current and maximum frame rate, as well as the V-Sync status, to the list of information.
options.chromium.showTime.description.1: Adds the current time, taken from your system, to the list of information.
Adds your current coordinates to the list of information.
options.chromium.showLight.description.1: Adds the current light level on the block you are standing on to the list of information.
options.chromium.showBiome.description.1: Adds the biome you are currently in to the list of information.
options.chromium.showMessagesTime.descri: The time each message was sent will be displayed before the message in the chat.
options.chromium.maxMessages.description: Maximum number of messages in chat history.
options.chromium.messageAnimations.descr: When enabled, new messages in the chat appear with a smooth animation.
options.chromium.showPingAmount.descript: Allows displaying the ping value in numbers next to or instead of ping bars in the tab list.
options.chromium.replacePingBars.descrip: If enabled, the ping value will replace the ping bars.
§nHas no effect if ping value display is disabled.
options.chromium.pingAmountAutoColor.des: Automatically adjusts the ping value color based on its value, from green for low ping to red for high ping.
options.chromium.pingAmountColor.descrip: §nThis works only if automatic color is disabled.
options.chromium.continueButtonEnabled.d: Allows you to quickly enter the world or server where you last played.
options.chromium.clearContinueInfo.descr: Clears the information about the last world or server you played on.
